home.name: Hi, I am Asithandile Tyulu
home.greeting: I am an aspiring fullstack developer

about.paragraph: I am an aspiring fullstack developer, a dynamic and passionate writer and former Community Coordinator & Tech Support at Fundza Literacy Trust, a South African non-profit organization that promotes literacy and a love of reading among young people. I am a recent graduate of the fullstack development course offered at Life Choices Academy. I fell in love with coding in my role at Fundza, as I had to liaise with ICT service providers to ensure that the site was working well and offering the audience the best user experience. I then left the organisation to pursue software development studies to achieve my goal of being a software developer. In my spare time I like reading, my favourite book is The Rapture of Canaan by Sheri Reynolds an hounarable mention would be, The Da Vinci Code by Dan Brown. I also enjoy listening to music while learning more about coding - I take it one language at a time. I also enjoy anime and basketball.

projects.description: This is my second e-commerce site, developed using HTML, CSS, Boostrap and JavaScript. The site is fully functional, and hosted on Netfliy

This was a collaborative project, putting to work all the skills learnt at Life Choices Academy. This used a robust technology stack, HTML5, Boostrap, CSS3, VueJS, NodeJS, JavaScript and MySQL. I mainly worked on the backend of the project.
This is my first e-commerce site. The site was made with HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
I create a site that converts RGB to Hexademicals. It was made with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Bootstrap.
This is a fully functional interest calculator, developed with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript.
I made a fully functional To Do List using JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Boostrap 5.
I made a fully functional calculator with HTML, CSS, Boostrap and JavaScript.

resume.duties: Embarking on a cybersecurity learning journey, I am preparing to assist on client projects, enhancing my skills to tackle evolving digital threats and safeguard sensitive information effectively. Through comprehensive training and hands-on experience, I aim to become a valuable asset in securing our clients' digital assets and fortifying their defenses against cyberattacks.
Uploading content on WordPress. Design covers for content. Troubleshoot the site and report to the team so they can relay the error to their ICT services providers.

User generated data collection and analysis, both qualitative and quantitative. Writing comprehensive reports on data collected. Social media coordination and management. Liaise with external ICT services providers to ensure the site offers the best UX. Content production, writing articles, and short stories.

Tutoring math and English to grade 8 & 9 pupils. Analysing their reports cards, and asking them what they struggle with to see I can maximise my time with them and offer a beneficial program. Creating and following a weekly content plan.

testimonials.testimony: Asithandile is a dedicated worker with an infectious personality and excellent people skills. He has strong resolve, works well with others and keeps an open mind to different points of view.
Asithandile is an eager, humble and hardworking individual. He always strives for excellence. Having a creative mindset, which helps him overcome many obstacles and challenges.

I believe Asithandile is a great asset for any company that chooses to work with him given that on top of his technical skills, he's also sociable, deeply introspective and has a high emotional intelligence making him a great colleague to have.

Asithandile is an exceptionally hardworking individual with a creative and analytical mind. His ability to approach challenges with an open mind and find innovative solutions is truly impressive. Working with Asithandile is a rewarding experience, as his dedication and problem-solving skills contribute immensely to the success of any project.

Asithandile is a hardworking individual, that strives to achieve the best at all times. Through his calm demeanor and critical thinking he excels in providing even under the most pressured environments and circumstances. Asithandile's ability to assess, rationalise and be decisive is a key attribute to his character, especially when needed to cooperate with others. He is a valuable asset to whomever he engages with and provides for.

Asithandile is truly inspiring and exceptionally knowledgeable. He brings a remarkable depth to his work, skilfully balancing moments of enjoyment with a strong sense of seriousness. His interactions with both himself and his colleagues are marked by grace and respect, reflecting his admirable demeanour. With an infectious energy for learning, he actively drives meaningful conversations. As an outstanding team player, Asithandile exhibits strong leadership qualities that contribute to the overall success of the team.
